top_comments.comment: I love when Ari gets excited cause he’s talking to someone that loves hip hop or is a hip hop musician/producer/etc. He gets so stoked, it’s awesome to see someone get to have their knowledge of a actual personal interest acknowledged by someone considered to be an expert. Also I think it’s hilarious how much he hates British food!!🤮🇬🇧
